pr_title: [FLINK-15637][state backends] Make RocksDB the default store for timers when using RocksDBStateBackend

update end-to-end test according to the defaul timer storage change

timeline.bodyText: Changing the default here to rocks makes sense, while I'm not sure the impact to e2e test (many cases will use rocksdb timer instead). Could you also include e2e tests in travis run to make sure no surprise? Thanks.
timeline.author: carp84

replies.bodyText: The result of the e2e test verification (#10905) looks good
